Commissioner Shotwell spoke; and presented a report.Julian Cernuda, Assistant to the City Manager, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Shotwell and Julian Cernuda, Assistant to the City Manager.Chair Morales spoke.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Commissioner Wise spoke.Laura Sellmer spoke.Chair Morales spoke.Page 9 of 11411 W.
